item.title: Banned from the irc
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I banned you (if I recall correctly) for constantly joining, leaving, joining, etc.

If I remember next time I’m on I will unban you.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the irc
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Contact a GM or administrator through PM on the forums.

[quote=“Anfernio, post:4, topic:314665”][ul][li]You’re a faggot.[/li]
[li]You have no friends.[/li]
[li]You’ve never heard of common sense.[/li]
[li]You’re in the 5th grade.[/li]
[li]Nobody around here likes you.[/li]
[li]You’re making fun of `Alec, yet I bet all the anime you watch helps you get girls.[/li][/ul][/quote]

Similar to you.

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:314696"][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=411132.msg3032608#msg3032608 date=1258495272]

[ul][li]You’re a faggot.[/li]
[li]You have no friends.[/li]
[li]You’ve never heard of common sense.[/li]
[li]You’re in the 5th grade.[/li]
[li]Nobody around here likes you.[/li]
[li]You’re making fun of `Alec, yet I bet all the anime you watch helps you get girls.[/li][/ul]

[/quote]I’m attracted.[/quote]

and you.
